title: The mysterious Russian airlift helping Syria's Assad
text:
The mysterious Russian airlift helping Syria's Assad 12:14pm BST - 02:03 
''We're not allowed to say anything,'' warned the Russian mercenary after exiting an unlisted flight from Damascus. ''Any minute the boss will come and we'll get in trouble. You, too.'' ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
"We're not allowed to say anything," warned the Russian mercenary after exiting an unlisted flight from Damascus. "Any minute the boss will come and we'll get in trouble. You, too."
